DOC.brief_title: Effect Omega-3 Fatty Acid Vitamin D Activation
DOC.criteria: Patients treat hemodialysis least 6 month 25hydroxyvitamin D < 30 ng/mL Patients history active infection within 3 month , Patients fish oil omega3 fatty acid supplementation within 3 month , Patients history fish , gelatin , and/or omega3 fatty acid allergy , Patients history hospital admission within 3 month , Patients history bleed within 3 month , Patients thrombocytopenia , Patients current use warfarin , Patients albumin level < 3.0 g/dL , Patients malignancy and/or liver cirrhosis
